EmailTemplate.description: This is the email template for when workflow notifies the Maintenance Worker of their ticket.
EmailTemplate.name: Maintenance Notification (solution)
EmailTemplate.subject: Maintenance Ticket Assigned to You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Maintenance_Ticket_solution__c.Maintenance_Worker__c},
The maintenance ticket {!Maintenance_Ticket_solution__c.Name} has been assigned to you.
What does it entail? {!Maintenance_Ticket_solution__c.Description__c}
Priority? {!Maintenance_Ticket_solution__c.Priority__c} Please mark your open task as closed in order to close out the ticket.
Thanks! Festival Management
